headline: 3M forecasts 2025 profit growth, shares rise
summary: STORY: Shares of 3M rose more than 5% Tuesday after the company's fourth-quarter results and 2025 profit forecast beat Wall Street estimates. CEO Bill Brown, on the job less than a year,...
